main event: An observation of a gaseous glow spherical object made on July 7, 1951 in Newport News, Virginia.
interesting points: The observation was made via Ground-Radar,The object was reported as stationary until it disappeared,The object seemed to black out and plunge earthward, The location of the object was in the northwestern sky at a 45-degree elevation, The case was evaluated as ARCTURUS.
witness description: CPL and PFC of the 110th T Harborcraft Company
